title: Eight men and seven women, including woman seated on right wearing dark suit, light colored shawl, dark hat, and eyeglasses, gathered around banquet table with light colored tablecloth, tea service, lit candles, and floral arrangement, in interior with square patterned linoleum floor, folding chairs, fluorescent ceiling fixtures, table with tea cups and sign inscribed "Welcome to Second Annual Tea...GPIL Greater Pittsburgh Improvement....." on left and piano and three women gathered on right
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
